# Work in progress!

$$
\langle \hat{\Psi}(r) \rangle \neq 0
$$

$$
\lim_{|r-r'|\to\infty}\langle \hat{\Psi}^{\dagger}(r)\hat{\Psi}(r')\rangle = \langle \hat{\Psi}^{\dagger}(r)\rangle \langle \hat{\Psi}(r')\rangle \neq 0 
$$

$$
\langle \hat{\Psi}^{\dagger}(r)\hat{\Psi}(r')\rangle = \sum_{i} n_i \cdot \chi_i(r)^* \chi_i(r')
$$

where $n_0=$ max $(n_i) \sim \mathcal{O}(N)$.
